name: Dice Shooter Extreme Fantasy Roleplay ULTIMATE
name_original: Dice Shooter Extreme Fantasy Roleplay ULTIMATE
description:
Music: Shelly Fire  - Will you Snail OST, provided by Jonas Tyroller.

This was my first time making a 3D game for a game jam. I couldn't make good terrain.
Full Screen Recomended.
on screen text at the start.
If the dice touches you. YOU DIE
WASD to move
Match the dice number with your own
You have to match the number on the face of the dice wit the one of your gun to deal damage. the dices have 5 hp and change color when hit. There is no volume control.
